name: 3 days: Zoo Mystery
description:
Solve a four-legged mystery and help save a family zoo in 3 Days - Zoo Mystery, an original and challenging hidden object game! Search the grounds of Anna's zoo and her hometown for hidden clues to the whereabouts of five missing animals. Will you be able to find the animals in time? Will Anna ever see her favorite elephant ever again? Find out in 3 Days - Zoo Mystery!
Play 3 Days - Zoo Mystery for free - it's safe and simple!

3 Days - Zoo Mystery features:

- 27 Challenging Levels
- 54 Unique Mini-Games
- Over 15 locations
- Engaging storyline
